version_description:
ver 1.01
- added stats panel

- brand new octopus bonus system
- UI redesign
- free gifts - earn money for active playing
- dragon offer now gives 100% office effectiveness in addition
- some bugs fixes

v.1.10
- Added Pinch to Zoom mechanic
- Added Languages: Dutch, Spanish, Bulgarian, Czech, German, French, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese
- Performance optimizations
- Bugs fixes

v.1.20
- New Buildings (Small Bank, Largest Generator, UFO Reactor, Arc Reactor)
- New graphics for all buildings
- Pinch to Zoom mechanics optimizations
- You can now change languages
- Removed Zoom buttons
- New languages: (Slovak, Ukrainian, Russian, Turkish)
- Bugs Fixes

- Added Korean Language
- Fixed but with new buildings

- New building (medium bank)
- Added Interface Animations
- Added Croatian language
- Improvements
- Fixed Bug - Impossible to build Arc Reactor Manager

v.1.30
- Brand new prestidge system - earn x4 bonus (x16 on level 2!)
- Wind turbine now produces more power (0.3 -> 0.5)
- Increased base Power Capacity (100 -> 200)

v.1.30
- Brand new prestidge system - earn x4 bonus (x16 on level 2!)
- Wind turbine now produces more power (0.3 -> 0.5)
- Increased base Power Capacity (100 -> 200)

v.1.31
- Fixed bug with Big Research Center not updating on bigger levels
- Fixed bug with AS+ numbers

1st Anniversary Update!
v.1.40
- 5 new buildings!
- Information panel for Generators and Panel Plants (tap on building).
- Simple tutorial for new players.
- New in-game notifications system. No more annoying popups!
- Localized prices.
- Added Arabic translation.
- Translations corrections.
- Performance improvements.

1.45
- New feature! Hold and drag to build faster.
- New feature! Hold and drag to destroy faster.
- Added Chinese language.
- Added Estonian language.
- Added Hebrew language.

1.45
- New feature! Hold and drag to build faster.
- New feature! Hold and drag to destroy faster.
- Added Chinese language.
- Added Estonian language.
- Added Hebrew language.

- New Achievements System. Unlock all of them!

- Turkish language corrections. Thanks to MEHMET TÜRKOĞLU.
- Added Finnish language. Thanks to Anton Saunderson.
- Added Thai language. Thanks to Jirapiphat Thanapattarachaiyasit (Ballgamer56).

- New feature! Hold and drag to build faster.
- New feature! Hold and drag to destroy faster.

- Performance Improvements.
- Now you can double your offline income!

- Now compatible with iPhone X.
- Make multiple upgrades by holding the upgrade button.
- Added indicator showing mountains/trees state.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Now compatible with iPhone X.
- Make multiple upgrades by holding the upgrade button.
- Added indicator showing mountains/trees state.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Now compatible with iPhone X.
- Make multiple upgrades by holding the upgrade button.
- Added indicator showing mountains/trees state.
- Minor bug fixes.

- Added indicator showing mountains/trees state.
